title: `vitest` hangs when using `adapter-cloudflare`
body:
### Describe the bug

Everything seems okay when using `adapter-auto`. However `vitest` hangs With `adapter-cloudflare`. I saw [this issue](https://github.com/vitest-dev/vitest/issues/2008) and tried `pool: 'forks'` but it didn't fix the problem.

### Reproduction

<https://github.com/wooseopkim/sveltekit-vitest-repro>

This repository contains source code generated with `npm create svelte@latest` just with the additional dependency of `@sveltejs/adapter-cloudflare`. Run `npm run test -- --run` to see the problem.
